comments.body:
Does this package need `setuptools` to get `pkg_resources:

https://github.com/csdms/bmi-tester/blob/master/bmi_tester/bmipytest.py#L7

It seems like it's pulling it in from somewhere else perhaps. Not sure if it should be an explicit dependency.

@synapticarbors Thanks for looking at this!

It seems that `setuptools` (and so `pkg_resources`) comes along with python. Because of that, I've been leaving it out of my recipes but would you like me to add a `setuptools` requirement?
